EmailTemplate.name: Expense Sheet is Ready for Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Expense Submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Zumzum__Expense_Sheet__c.OwnerFirstName},
The following expenses have been sent for approval:
Expense ID: {!Zumzum__Expense_Sheet__c.Name}
Please log into your portal to view any details.
Kind regards NCT
